nodes.text: XT-9T was a battle droid that served the Sith Empire at the Imperial base camp on the planet Ilum during the Battle of Ilum in the Galactic War against the Galactic Republic. It recruited Imperial operatives for Grand Moff Ilyan Regus after Darth Malgus betrayed the Empire and established his New Empire.

XT-9T appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as the courier for "An Empire Betrayed," the Imperial faction mission that continues the Ilum planetary storyline and sends players to complete the Flashpoints "The Battle of Ilum" and "The False Emperor."
